amendment.description: Amendment makes sundry technical and conforming changes to the bill in order to allow the measure to be properly applied to existing statute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 113-626 to make technical changes to conform with recent amendments to the underlying statute. The amendment also reiterates the independence of the Science Advisory Board and clarifies pre-existing language.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stewart amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 184 (Roll no. 523).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Stewart.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Stewart amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 184 (Roll no. 523).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stewart amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 184 (Roll no. 523).
